original_title: 金田一耕助VS明智小五郎ふたたび
overview: Ryujo Hoshiko (Goriki Ayame) comes to detective Kindaichi Kosuke’s (Yamashita Tomohisa) office with a request. She would like him to investigate an attempt to poison her father, Baron Ryujo Kiyohisa (Tsukayama Masane).
title: Kindaichi Kosuke vs Akechi Kogoro Again
